text: "Fibbin'" is a popular song, with music by Michael Merlo and words by Patrick Welch, written in 1958. In the United States, the most popular version was a recording by Patti Page (Mercury Records catalog number 71355) that was made in 1958, entering the Billboard chart on September 28, 1958, lasting 9 weeks, and reaching #39 on the chart. In the United Kingdom, Petula Clark recorded the song. Category:Patti Page songs Category:Petula Clark songs Category:1958 songs
title: Fibbin'
